Name: Rise of the samurai in VR
About the game: During the Warring States Period in Japan, the Tokugawa Shogunate levied heavily and aggressively. So a young Ronin fled Kyoto, and came to North China. He studied archery and samurai swords in China and Korea. He then set off from the Chinese city at the foot of the Great Wall, traveled through Korean kingdoms, Shikoku Island, and finally returned to Japan to kill corrupt shogunates and to become a samurai with knighthood who took from the rich and helped the poor. Operation Instructions: Click the left-hand handle menu button to pop up the menu Press and hold the Touchpad button on the left handle to emit a ray. When the ray falls on the UI interface, press the Trigger button on the left handle to press the button Hold down the Touchpad button on the right handle to launch the curve to display the next drop point, release it to transmit to the drop point position Move the handle to the weapon, press Trigger to take the weapon Bow and arrow status: Click the Trigger button with the left hand to take the weapon, hold the Trigger button with the right hand to pull the longbow, and release the Trigger button with the right hand to shoot the arrow Katana state: Click on the Trigger button on the handle to get it Replace the weapon: place the weapon close to the green dotted frame of the corresponding weapon
